events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and a stationary pole, causing significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the keywords found in the initial report.
An agent with experience in auto claims has been assigned to assist the customer in processing their claim.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and will begin processing it promptly.
Please provide photos of the damaged vehicle, the police report, and any witness statements related to the accident.
The customer has submitted all requested documents, including photos and the official police report.
Our investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and statements to assess the claim.
The review of available evidence has been completed, and the findings support the claim validity.
A settlement offer has been proposed covering repair costs and rental car expenses during the repair period.
Customer responded with acceptance of the settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling of their claim.
The claim has been formally approved by the claims manager and is ready for payment processing.
The approved settlement amount has been transferred to the customer's bank account successfully.
The claim is now closed following the payment issuance and final confirmation from the customer.
The entire claim file including all documents and correspondence has been archived for future reference.
